name: Ramon Bueso - Odyssey - Robusto
additionalNotes:
Ramon Bueso cigars are crafted from premium tobaccos for an unrivaled experience. Always balanced, always smooth, and always a treat for the senses, Ramon Bueso cigars continue to captivate cigar enthusiasts everywhere with Genesis Habano, Genesis The Project, and Olancho Vintage. These delicious super-premiums 
Ramon Bueso has worked behind the scenes in the cigar industry for over forty years. He’s worked with well known cigar figure  Frank Llaneza at the Villazon Factory where Bueso learned the business and craft.
